intro: Shove it, stack it, sort it out!
description:
Welcome to a world of crazy organizers, explosive makeup bags, and kitchen shelves barely holding on under the weight of random stuff! In Stuff It, there’s only one rule: everything has to fit... somewhere!


Your mission? To cram the most absurd combinations of items into tight spaces. Hairbrushes, colorful hairdryers, giant ladles, way too many trinkets, and even rubber duckies - all waiting for your master-level packing skills!


Each level throws you into a totally new challenge - bizarre shapes, unruly objects, and sometimes things you don’t even remember ever owning. But don’t panic! Use your superpower of organizing, make some room, and... stuff it!


What’s in store?
- Over 105 levels of chaos to conquer!
- Special modes (Easy, Medium, Hard) unlocked after completing the game - for those who  love a challenge!
- Dozens of colorful items - from kitchen gear to beauty products!
- Relaxing, feel-good music to help you focus… even when everything is falling out!
- Wacky graphics that bring every drawer item to life!
- Funny effects and reactions - because every win deserves a fanfare (and confetti)!

Don’t ask where that giant spoon came from - just find a spot for it!

Stuff It - because who said cleaning can't be epic?
